header.title: I am Not a Furry Developer
header.description: Hi! I'm Qky, I'm a Front-End developer and a Bot developer. I'm developing stuff just for fun. Furthermore, I'm and also interested in making 3D Animation on **Blender**.

faq.title: Who are you?
faq.description: Let me introduce myself. My name is **Qky**, pronounced as "**Kiki**" or  "**Kyuki**" You can call me whatever, but please don't call me letter by letter... like "**Q, K, Y**" *(Kyu, Key, Why!?)*

faq.title: What the hell is this?
faq.description: Oh? Are you talking about this website? Well, this is my personal website :D maybe I will put something on it xD

faq.title: What are you good at?
faq.description: In the past **%s** years, I've learned a lot. I'm still learning some programming languages that I'm interested in. Not only that, but I also have 3D animation skills and drawing skills (well not very often since I lack the tools to draw digitally)

faq.title: Are you a furry?
faq.description: That is a weird question to ask, but for the record, yes, I am, but umm...

faq.title: This is nice!
faq.description: Oh, thanks! I made it by myself and with a bit of help from my pal [Matteu](https://matteusan.me). I'm glad that you're enjoying this website.
